no_room_message: No room types have been created. Before you begin, create room types for your property.
no_room_types_message: No created room types were found. Create a room type to get started.
no_reservation_policy_message: No booking policies have been created. Click 'Edit' to add your own.
advance_payment_no_required_message: No advance payment is required for reservations.
advance_payment_required_message: Requires {{count}}% deposit when guest makes a reservation.
cancellation_policies_not_display: Cancellation policies are not displayed when prepayment is not required.
deposit_refunded: {{amount}}% of the deposit will be refunded if the guest cancels {{count}} days before arrival.
children_not_allowed: Children are not allowed at this property
children_allowed_zero: Children of all age are allowed at this property
children_allowed_one: Children one year and older are allowed at this property
children_allowed_other: Children {{count}} years and older are allowed at this property
children_private_room_only: Children can only be accommodated in private rooms.
children_dorm_room_only: Children are only allowed in dormitories.
children_any_room: Children are allowed in any type of room.
pay_in_advance_message: Is it necessary to pay in advance to make a reservation?
no_policies: No cancellation policy has been created.
are_children_allowed: Are children allowed on your property?
room_types_allowed_for_children: Types of rooms allowed for children
permanently_remove_account_message: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. These actions cannot be undone.
password_requirement: The password must contain at least 14 characters: 4 lowercase letters, 2 uppercase letters, 2 numbers and 2 symbols.
sign_in_fail_msg: We could not sign you into your account. Please, try again.
invalid_credentials: Invalid username or password, or your account is not validated
forgot_password_text: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions on how to reset your account.
accept_terms: I accept SimpleHostel's <terms>Terms and Conditions</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policies</privacy>
confirm_email_message: We've sent an email to your inbox with a confirmation link. Please check your email and click the link to complete your account setup. If you don't see it within a few minutes, check your spam or junk folder.
email_verified_message: Your email address was successfully Verified. You can now log into your account
advance_payment_rule: When a guest makes a reservation through your website using the Simple Hostel booking engine, the reservation will initially be marked as Provisional on your calendar. As the host, you are responsible for contacting the guest to arrange payment of the required deposit. The reservation will remain provisional until payment is confirmed.
cancellation_policies_rule: When a guest cancels a reservation, you can define whether the advance payment will be refunded or not. Your cancellation policy helps set clear expectations for guests and ensures a fair process for both parties.
children_policies_rule: Define whether children are allowed in your property. If permitted, you can specify which types of rooms they can stay in, such as private rooms only or any room. This policy helps set clear expectations for families and ensures a suitable accommodation experience.
other_policies_rule: Establish other policies relevant to your property, such as quiet hours, smoking areas, pet restrictions, and more.
invitation: {{name}} has invited you to join their team.
get_started: To get started, please create a password for your account.
